available_skills.name: moveTo
available_skills.description: Move robot arm to a named pose (HOME, approach_bolts, place_bolts). Does NOT work with object names.

available_skills.name: grasp
available_skills.description: Complete grasp sequence for target object: opens gripper, moves to approach position, closes gripper, attaches object. Use this for picking up objects.
internal_sequence: Move arm to object's approach position
Attach object to gripper (if object.io.do_attach_after_approach is true)

available_skills.name: release
available_skills.description: Complete release sequence for grasped object: detaches object from gripper, opens gripper. Use this for placing objects.

available_skills.name: openGripper
available_skills.description: Manually open the gripper. Only use if you need gripper control independent of grasp/release.
available_skills.note: Usually not needed - grasp and release handle gripper automatically

available_skills.name: closeGripper
available_skills.description: Manually close the gripper. Only use if you need gripper control independent of grasp/release.
available_skills.note: Usually not needed - grasp and release handle gripper automatically

skill_usage_notes.for_picking_objects: Use grasp(ObjectName) - handles entire pick sequence
skill_usage_notes.for_placing_objects: Use release(ObjectName) - handles entire place sequence
skill_usage_notes.for_moving_to_poses: Use moveTo(PoseName) - only for named poses, NOT objects
skill_usage_notes.common_mistake: Do NOT use moveTo with object names like TopCoverBolts - use grasp/release instead
